mapper.select: SELECT os.os_no, m.mem_no, m.mem_name, oi.oi_no, os.os_qty, pd_name, od_date ,q.qna_ctgr,o.od_no FROM orders_ins oi INNER JOIN orders o ON oi.od_no = o.od_no INNER JOIN member m ON m.mem_no = o.mem_no INNER JOIN prod_ins pi ON pi.pi_no = oi.pi_no INNER JOIN prod p ON p.pd_no = pi.pd_no inner join orders_status os on os.oi_no= oi.oi_no inner join qna q on q.od_no = o.od_no WHERE os.os_status = '처리대기' ORDER BY q.qna_date DESC
